title: [1.10.2][CustomDrones——自定义无人机]超过46万亿种无人机
author: 0x3B800001
txt_content:
本帖最后由 没糖的葫芦 于 2018-8-3 15:39 编辑 

InterestingWork 有趣工作室授权搬运&汉化
授权证明：

介绍：你可以制造超过46万亿种不同的无人机组合！伙伴只有两个胳膊两条腿太无聊？你厌烦只背包只有36个格子，但是却有太多的物品要拿？你厌倦了在你挖钻石的时候怪物包围了你？你想拥有一个会发射激光还会飞的机器人伙伴吗？那么你需要自定义无人机！这个模组宗旨在于添加充分发挥作用的无人机来帮助孤单的玩家。在所有的东西中，从简单的任务收集掉落物、搬运物品像一个会飞的背包，还可以射击怪物，奇怪的任务像扫描周围的环境来找矿石和山，带起生物或带起你飞一圈。有一天它可能会瞬移，就像末影人一样。
作者原文：Are companions with 2 legs and 2 arms too boring?
Are you sick of having just 36 inventory slots, but TOO MANY ITEMS TO CARRY?
Are you tired of not knowing if there are monsters around you when you are digging for 'em diamonds?
Do you want to have A FLYING ROBOT COMPANION THAT CAN SHOOT kind-of-LASER????
Then you need a CustomDrone!

---*---

This mod aims to add fully functioning drones to aid the lovely players (that's you) with all kinds of stuffs, from simple tasks likecollecting dropped items, carrying items around like a flying backpack, and shooting at monsters to bizarre tasks likescanning the environment for ores and monsters, picking up mobs or even picking up yourself and fly around, and maybe one day teleport like an Enderman.
Or maybe you can start a race with your fellow friends to see who can fly a drone better and faster?
The possibilities are almost endless with drones. In fact, it goes around 46,913,768,005,632 possible drones, down to the very specific abilities that you can install to each of your drone. And that number will continue to rise.
So why not get yourself a drone and fly 'em

图片欣赏：









教程：汉化中...国内视频：[问烨][1.10.2]自定义无人机MOD介绍：可以，这很无人机：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-611866-1-1.html★我的世界★Minecraft《籽岷的1.10.2模组介绍 无人机 Mod》：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-629872-1-1.html
下载地址：原贴下载地址（即使你不从这下载，也请你点击一下支持一下作者）
国内网盘：CustomDrones-1.4.0 for mc1.10.2基本汉化版CustomDrones-1.5.0 for mc1.10.2英文版1.5.0的汉化版本会尽快出。。更新日志（英文）：1.2.0-Mining and Protecting modules functional, obtainable in non-creative modes (because recipe available)-Added model and color customization using Painter and Screw-Added a new model: Uni-wing-Added color palette - use palette to recolor your whole drone, or color the drone part by part
1.1.0-Camera module functional-Drone's flying mode names are more self-explanatory-Added projectile deflecting, fire extinguishing, and explosion negating, and multi protecting modules-Added 4 ranks Mining modules-Crafter gui will always work, and creative mode will not consume materials-Drones can now be attacked and will be knocked back when attacked-Drones can be recollected into an item-Drones's controller range is now (64 x chip rank) blocks (for manual control mode)-Modules can be uninstalled
1.0.3-Fixed server crash, again!-Crafter now craft stuffs for free if you are in creative mode.-Drone size smaller, now they can fit in a block.
1.0.2Now servers can install DronesGui exiting no long causes NPE
1.0.1-Fixed Crafter giving 1 stack each craft instead of 1 item-Fixed drone's wings rotation calculation. Previously it could spin too fast that it looks like it is not spinning at all-Fixed being able to install modules when there is no more module slots-Fixed battery saving mod's screen showing wrong battery consumption when used with solar power or heat power mods-Removed the drone itself from scanning by Scan modules

Minecraft交流群：424962164

楼主你去跟作者说一下一大坨的中国玩家都想要1.7.10怎么样OWO

I'm sorry to say 1.7.10 won't come out soon due to lots of reasons
翻译：我很抱歉，由于很多原因，1.7.10将不会近期发布
